author: ianna
body:
* Access a TGeoManager with any name, for example:
```
cmsShow --sim-geom-file cmsDD4HepGeom.root --tgeo-name=world -c geo.fwc
```

The default name stays the same: "cmsGeo;1"

Here is how a DD4Hep geometry dump looks like:
![screenshot 2018-05-15 11 37 21](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1390682/40063521-cf667942-585d-11e8-96fa-9ef39ce56262.png)
title: DD4Hep: cmsShow TGeo Name Option
